features.situation: on DX and DX-based skill rolls to keep your feet or avoid being knocked down in combat
on all rolls to keep your feet if the surface is wet, slippery or unstable

db449c64-ff64-4718-8a40-3b1c8d6406fe.name: Elven Gear
db449c64-ff64-4718-8a40-3b1c8d6406fe.notes: 10% off final price of gear qualified as "Elven" (GM's decision)

af59ac79-ba6d-4568-b265-c613a3543392.name: Loner
af59ac79-ba6d-4568-b265-c613a3543392.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

c29d1a76-f6ea-403c-a1b2-f0cc5cef73b4.text: Elf racial template from GURPS Dungeon Fantasy 3: The Next Level
